definition: beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]

sentences.english: I firmly believe that every child is a jade to be polished.
sentences.chinese: 我堅信，每個孩子都是一塊待雕琢的美玉。

sentences.english: In the fine gold beautiful jade fire burns, in the wonderful ice flowers snow carves.
sentences.chinese: 精金美玉火中燒，美妙冰花雪裏雕。

sentences.english: I think the new employer is a rough diamond.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得那個新僱員是一塊未經雕琢的美玉。

sentences.english: Brushed its glaze smooth exquisite, like jewels.
sentences.chinese: 拂其釉面平滑細膩，如同美玉。

sentences.english: the joints of thy thighs are like jewels, the work of the hands of a cunning workman.
sentences.chinese: 你的大腿圓潤，好像美玉，是巧匠的手做成的。

sentences.english: "Bi"is the valuable ritual vessels and another name for jade.
sentences.chinese: “璧”爲貴重禮器，也是美玉的通稱。

sentences.english: Ep753 - Meiyu successfully stays in Jinsheng's house. She plans to create problems for the Wu family.
sentences.chinese: 美玉順利住進金生家裏，打算把吳家搞到雞犬不寧。

sentences.english: Unluckily there is a obvious crack on the jade.
sentences.chinese: 遺憾的是這塊美玉上有一道明顯的裂璺。
您們好，我的名字是美玉。

definition: sheep-fat white jade, a type of jade
jade/jade and stone/(fig.) the good and the bad
Baiyü county (Tibetan: dpal yul rdzong) in Garze Tibetan autonomous prefecture 甘孜藏族自治州[Gan1 zi1 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Sichuan (formerly in Kham province of Tibet)
pearls and jades/jewels/clever remark/beautiful writing/gems of wisdom/genius/outstanding person
Karakax County in Hotan Prefecture 和田地區|和田地区[He2 tian2 Di4 qu1], Xinjiang
jade disk with a hole in the center
pure and limpid/(of a person) quick-witted
a jade worker/a jade statuette/a beautiful person/(term of endearment)
